traits.Amphibious: The toad can breathe air or water.
traits.Cold Aura: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the toad takes 3 (1d6) cold damage.
traits.Standing Leap: The toad's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +3+1d4 + 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) cold damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature it is grappled (escape DC 11+1d4 + 9). Until this grapple ends, the toad can't bite another target.
